actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-560.

official_title: Resolution disapproving certain provisions of the regulations issued and proposed by the Administrator of General Services under the Presidential Recordings and Materials Preservation Act.

summary.text: Disapproves specified provisions of the regulations proposed, under the Presidential Recordings and Materials Preservation Act, by the Administrator of the General Services Administration in his report to the House of Representatives submitted on March 19, 1975.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving certain provisions of the regulations issued and proposed by the Administrator of General Services under the Presidential Recordings and Materials Preservation Act.
